content:
To connect to a remote sftp server, first establish an secure SSH connection and then create an SFTP session as shown.


$ sftp tecmint@192.168.56.10
pws # the remote
lls # the client
put -r client_folder remote_path

Source https://www.tecmint.com/sftp-upload-download-directory-in-linux/
title: Connect to Remote FTP Server Securely
